title: 1 GB per month
info: 1 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 110 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *344*30# to activate.

title: 2GB per month
info: 2 GB Internet for 30 days at the price of 220 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *344*31#.
